title: #467 Nelson Muntz with Dan Soder
itunes:title: Nelson Muntz with Dan Soder
description:
Dan Soder came over to talk about his special that came out nearly three years ago. "Son Of A Gary" on HBOMax. This podcast is three years in the making. I've been wanting to get Dan on to talk about his dad Gary since the release of his special, but then something happened and we never got around to it. 

After we finished the episode, I had one last question to ask Dan but I forgot, so I drove all the way to his place just to ask him this one question, because I care so much about you, the listener. 

Watch "Son Of A Gary" on HBOMax right now!

For more Ari Shaffir: 

Ari is recording his 4th comedy special this June in New York! Get tickets now: Ari Shaffir: Jew

The Music:

Everclear - Father of mine

Jane’s Addiction - Had a Dad

Draco and the Malfoys - My Dad Is Rich

Andrew Jackson Jihad - Who Are You

Hurray for the Riff Raff - Living in the City

Soder’s This IS Not Happening story

Temptations - Papa Was A Rolling Stone

 

Thank you to our sponsors! Check out MasterWorks.Art/ARI get cultured and invest in a famous piece of art! Also, check out 3chi.com for all your Delta 8 needs. Use promo code "Ari" at checkout for 5% off.
